text: Los Angeles, CA – March 22, 2018 – E! News builds on its successful slate of digital content as the network ’ s hit original Snapchat Show “ Face Forward ” returns for a 16 - episode second season premiering exclusively on Snapchat ’ s Discover Page on Saturday, March 24 at 6am ET. New episodes will be available Saturdays worldwide and previously released episodes will be available using Snapchat ’ s Search feature. Beauty guru Patrick Starrr, online hair sensation Tiarra Monet, and celebrity stylist Johnny Wujek reunite as they meet deserving young women who are ready for a complete style overhaul culminating in a celebrity - inspired photo shoot. Season one “ Face Forward ” averaged 5 million unique viewers per episode. Additionally, Abercrombie & Fitch
